0x4B087305.name: GET_PED_HAIR_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR
0x4B087305.description: A getter for [\_SET_PED_HAIR_COLOR](#\_0x4CFFC65454C93A49). Returns -1 if fails to get.

examples.code:
local secondaryColour = GetPedHairHighlightColor(PlayerPedId())
if secondaryColour == 32 then
  print("You have pink hair highlight colour!")
end
